params.name: num_partitions
params.description: The number of parts within a model parallel group. Defaults to 1.

params.name: gather_out
params.description: Whether to gather the output tensor. Defaults to True.

params.name: param_attr
params.description: Specify the parameter property, including the initialization method.Defaults to None which means the default parameter property will be used.

params.name: bias_attr
params.description: Specify the bias property.Defaults to None which means the default parameter property will be used.

params.name: name
params.description: Normally there is no need for user to set this property.Defaults to None.
